## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_RATE\_VARIANCE" property

Emitted when the rate per second variance of the particle emission rate is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript

        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;

    };
```
